verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764>, A Psalm <WH4210> of David <WH1732>. Deliver <WH2502> <WH8761> me, O YY <WH3068>, from the evil <WH7451> man <WH120>: preserve <WH5341> <WH8799> me from the violent <WH2555> man <WH376>;
Which imagine <WH2803> <WH8804> mischiefs <WH7451> in their heart <WH3820>; continually <WH3117> are they gathered together <WH1481> <WH8799> for war <WH4421>.
They have sharpened <WH8150> <WH8804> their tongues <WH3956> like a serpent <WH5175>; adders <WH5919> ' poison <WH2534> is under their lips <WH8193>. Selah <WH5542>.

Keep <WH8104> <WH8798> me, O YY <WH3068>, from the hands <WH3027> of the wicked <WH7563>; preserve <WH5341> <WH8799> me from the violent <WH2555> man <WH376>; who have purposed <WH2803> <WH8804> to overthrow <WH1760> <WH8800> my goings <WH6471>.

The proud <WH1343> have hid <WH2934> <WH8804> a snare <WH6341> for me, and cords <WH2256>; they have spread <WH6566> <WH8804> a net <WH7568> by the wayside <WH3027> <WH4570>; they have set <WH7896> <WH8804> gins <WH4170> for me. Selah <WH5542>.
I said <WH559> <WH8804> unto the YY <WH3068>, Thou art my 'Elohim <WH410>: hear <WH238> <WH8685> the voice <WH6963> of my supplications <WH8469>, O YY <WH3068>.
O GOD <WH3069> the YY <WH136>, the strength <WH5797> of my salvation <WH3444>, thou hast covered <WH5526> <WH8804> my head <WH7218> in the day <WH3117> of battle <WH5402>.

Grant <WH5414> <WH8799> not, O YY <WH3068>, the desires <WH3970> of the wicked <WH7563>: further <WH6329> <WH8686> not his wicked device <WH2162>; lest they exalt <WH7311> <WH8799> themselves. Selah <WH5542>.
As for the head <WH7218> of those that compass me about <WH4524>, let the mischief <WH5999> of their own lips <WH8193> cover <WH3680> <WH8762> them.

Let burning coals <WH1513> fall <WH4131> <WH8735> <WH8675> <WH4131> <WH8686> upon them: let them be cast <WH5307> <WH8686> into the fire <WH784>; into deep pits <WH4113>, that they rise not up again <WH6965> <WH8799>.
Let not an evil speaker <WH376> <WH3956> be established <WH3559> <WH8735> in the earth <WH776>: evil <WH7451> shall hunt <WH6679> <WH8799> the violent <WH2555> man <WH376> to overthrow <WH4073> him.
I know <WH3045> <WH8804> that the YY <WH3068> will maintain <WH6213> <WH8799> the cause <WH1779> of the afflicted <WH6041>, and the right <WH4941> of the poor <WH34>.
Surely the righteous <WH6662> shall give thanks <WH3034> <WH8686> unto thy name <WH8034>: the upright <WH3477> shall dwell <WH3427> <WH8799> in thy presence <WH6440>.
